description: Explore Cisco's pioneering efforts in open source networking and blockchain security, leading to enhanced innovation, interoperability, cost-effectiveness, and secure digital ecosystems. Learn about Cisco's major contributions like OpenDaylight, FD.io VPP, and Contiv, as well as blockchain initiatives in secure transactions, IoT security, and fraud prevention.
keywords: Cisco, open source networking, blockchain security, OpenDaylight, FD.io VPP, Contiv, software-defined networking, blockchain initiatives, IoT security, network infrastructure, digital transformation
title: Exploring Cisco's Innovations: Open Source Networking and Blockchain Security
